title: Lanka UNP MPs go on ‘red alert’ as New Delhi suddenly pushes $ 886000, Committee activated to resolve strife
content: File Photo by Onlanka News Sri Lanka’s opposition UNP party MPs are now agitated by a large financial grant suddenly given to party coffers by New Delhi. The financial endowment is reportedly around $ 886000 (SL Rs. 100 million). A weekend Sinhala language newspaper “Irudina” alleged that the funds were donated by New Delhi during…
